alert.note: Alert for Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SULLIVAN...JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN CARTER AND SOUTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF BRISTOL THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bristol Va to Walnut Hill to 6 miles northeast of Spurgeon. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Mountain City, Walnut Hill, Colonial Heights, Bluff City, Damascus, Morril`s Cave, and Laurel Bloomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
